properties.name: Uetliberg
properties.description: Zurich's "Hausberg". Enjoy an excellent view over the city, lake, and the alpine range. Reachable by train (S10, plus some 15' easy uphill walking), or as a ~1:30h steep uphill hike from the city (tram stop: Triemli).

properties.name: Z端richhorn
properties.description: Stroll along the eastern lake shore to Z端richhorn, for a panorama of the city, the lake, and the mountains. Small beach and large green area to relax. You can take a boat back into the city from Z端richhorn pier (included in the 110 city zone).

properties.name: Z端richberg
properties.description: Enjoy the view above the city and the lake, with the alps in the back. For a short stroll, you can ride the funicular up to Rigiblick (from "Seilbahn Rigiblick") and walk over to the tram stop "Zoo" (all included in the 110 city zone).

properties.name: Flussbad Oberer Letten
properties.description:
Cool off in the river Limmat, floating downstream. You can enter as far up as "Drahtschmidlisteg". Restaurant and bar for snacks and drinks. Facilities available in the bathing facility (free entry).

Caution: Be aware of the river's current, good swimmers only, check in advance where to exit (via ladders, observe the exit signs!); safety guards are only partially on site.

properties.name: Flussbad Werdinsel
properties.description:
Cool off in the river Limmat, floating downstream. Nice lawn for sunbathing, restaurant and bar for snacks and drinks. Facilities available in the bathing facility (free entry).

Caution: Be aware of the river's current, good swimmers only, check in advance where to exit (via ladders, observe the exit signs!); safety guards are usually on site.

properties.name: Seebad Tiefenbrunnen
properties.description: Cool off in the Zurich lake. Lawn for sunbathing, restaurant and bar for snacks and drinks, playgrounds and non-swimmer bathing area, bathing facilities. 8CHF entrance fee (adults).

properties.name: Seebad Mythenquai
properties.description: Cool off in the Zurich lake. Lawn for sunbathing, restaurant and bar for snacks and drinks, playgrounds and non-swimmer bathing area, bathing facilities. 8CHF entrance fee (adults).
